Getting started:
  # Download latest jar file from [http://pos-device-simulator.googlecode.com/files/pos-device-sim-1.0.jar here]
  # Add the jar file to the Point of Sale classpath
  # Update or create a new jpos.xml for the device simulator.
    * *Example of Simuluated MSR* <JposEntry logicalName="MSR"><creation serviceClass="org.jumpmind.pos.javapos.sim.SimulatedMSRService" /></JposEntry>
  # Run Point of Sale application
